root: ^Jy weet mos, bru, regret is ‘n heavy thing. Some mense live hulle hele life met regret. Wat dink jy van daai?

s: ^I try to live without regrets by thinking through my choices.
^I don’t care about regrets. I’ll deal with them later.
^I’ve already got regrets, but I’m moving on.

No_Regrets_Choices: ^Aweh, daai’s die way to go, maar onthou, soms kan die wrong choice still creep up on jou.
^"Here’s a test for jou thinking: If jy had to choose between letting go or holding onto something painful, wat gaan jy choose?"

s: ^I’d let it go. Holding onto regret will just weigh me down.
^I’d hold onto it to remind myself not to repeat mistakes.

c-0: ^"Goed, bru. Knowing when to let go is ‘n skill op itself."
c-1: ^"Interesting choice, bru. Maar onthou, regret kan ook ‘n chain wees."

Regret_Test_Complete: ^"On die Flats, regret kom vinnig. Make sure jy kan live met jou choices."
Face_The_Past_Quest: ^"Here’s ‘n challenge: Think back to one thing jy regret the most, and imagine what jy would do differently. Wat gaan jy choose?"

s: ^I’d confront it head-on, making sure I wouldn’t repeat it.
^I’d avoid it altogether. The past is better left alone.

c-0: ^"Aweh, daai’s die way to face it. Soms facing jou past make jou stronger."
c-1: ^"Interesting choice, bru. Maar onthou, the past kan sometimes find jou."

Quest_Complete: ^"Op die Flats, jy gaan kry reminders of jou past choices. Make sure jy know hoe to live met jou decisions."
Dont_Care_Regrets: ^Jy dink so, maar later kom vinniger as wat jy dink. Die Flats gaan nie wait nie.

s: ^I’ll deal with them when they come.

Deal_With_Regrets: ^Ons gaan sien, maar regret maak ‘n person weak, bru.
Moving_On_Regrets: ^Daai’s fair, maar jy moet onthou die past gaan mos nie stay buried nie. Jy gaan kry daai regret later.

s: ^I’ll handle it when it comes up.
